rebellion.description.English:
There happened a bloody rebellion in the city of {0}! Due to general unhappiness and disloyalty, your people said enough is enough, and now daggers roam the city's countryside!

Crush the rebels!

info.happycity.English: The city approves your rule, as a result its income is boosted!

info.unhappycity.English: The city is very unhappy, meaning a rebellion could soon erupt!

info.mehcity.English: The city is neither happy nor discontent.
